com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice

类 AylaLocalDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaDevice
      • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.AylaLocalDevice
  • 直接已知子类:
    AylaBLEDevice

    public class AylaLocalDevice
extends AylaDevice
    The AylaLocalDevice class represents an AylaDevice that does not have a persistent connection to the Ayla Cloud Service, but rather relies on local connectivity (e.g. Bluetooth, NFC, etc.) to talk to the device. In addition to providing connectivity with the IoT device, an AylaLocalDevice is also responsible for updating the Ayla Cloud Service with datapoints and status from the local IoT device when it is connected. Implementers must extend the AylaLocalDevice class to implement

    • 方法详细资料

      • connectLocal

        public AylaAPIRequest connectLocal(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                   ErrorListener errorListener)
        Connects to the device locally. If the device cannot be reached, the errorListener will be called with a PreconditionError. Otherwise, the successListener will be called with an EmptyResponse indicating that the connection has been made.
        参数:
        successListener - Listener called when the connection is complete
        errorListener - Listener called with an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation

      • disconnectLocal

        public AylaAPIRequest disconnectLocal(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                      ErrorListener errorListener)
        Disconnects the local connection to the device.
        参数:
        successListener - Listener to receive the response when the operation succeeds
        errorListener - Listener called if an error occurs
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation

      • isConnectedLocal

        public boolean isConnectedLocal()
        Returns true if the mobile device is connected to the IoT device using the local connection protocol (e.g. Bluetooth, etc.)
        返回:
        true if the device is currently connected, false otherwise

      • setOTAStatus

        public AylaAPIRequest setOTAStatus(int status,
                                   int commandId,
                                   com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                   ErrorListener errorListener)
        Sets the status of an OTA software update. After performing the OTA update of the local device, the application must call setOTAStatus to report the success or failure of the update. Successful updates should set the status to 0. Any non-zero value is considered a failure and is defined by the manufacturer. This method will also ack the command, so a separate call to #ackCommand(int, int, Listener, ErrorListener) is not needed.
        参数:
        status - Zero for success, or an app-specific error code
        commandId - ID of the OTA command that started this OTA update
        successListener - Listener called if the operation is successful
        errorListener - Listener called with an error should one occur
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation.

      • ackCommand

        public AylaAPIRequest ackCommand(int commandId,
                                 int status,
                                 com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                 ErrorListener errorListener)
        Sets the status of a device command. This method should be called after a device command (OTA update, for example) has completed. The command ID can be found in the processed command, and the status should reflect an HTTP status (e.g. 200 for success).
        参数:
        commandId - ID of the command that was processed
        status - HTTP status for the result of the command operation
        successListener - Listener called if the operation is successful
        errorListener - Listener called if the operation failed
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation

      • getValueForProperty

        public <T> T getValueForProperty(AylaLocalProperty<T> property)
        Callback from AylaLocalProperty to obtain its current value.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the property being queried
        参数:
        property - Property being queried
        返回:
        the value this property should indicate

      • isPropertyReadOnly

        public boolean isPropertyReadOnly(AylaLocalProperty property)
        Returns true if the given property is writable. The LocalDevice cloud implementation requires that all properties are "To Device", which usually implies read-only. This method allows each property's writability to be determined by the owning device.
        参数:
        property - Property to determine writability of
        返回:
        true if read-only, false if writable

      • setValueForProperty

        public <T> AylaAPIRequest<T> setValueForProperty(AylaLocalProperty<T> property,
                                                 T value,
                                                 com.android.volley.Response.Listener<T> successListener,
                                                 ErrorListener errorListener)
        Callback from AylaLocalProperty to write a value. Implementers must set the corresponding value on the physical device as well as echo the new property value to the cloud in the form of a datapoint. See AylaProperty#createDatapoint(Object, Map, int, Listener, ErrorListener) for details.
        类型参数:
        T - Base type of the property
        参数:
        property - Property whose value is to be set
        value - Value to set the property to
        successListener - Listener to receive the results of a successful operation. The response should be called with the new value that was set.
        errorListener - Listener called with an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest representing the asynchronous request, which may be canceled

      • getHardwareAddress

        public java.lang.String getHardwareAddress()
        Returns the hardware address for this device. This identifier is used during device registration.
        返回:
        the unique identifier for this device

      • requiresLocalConfiguration

        public boolean requiresLocalConfiguration()
        Indicates whether or not this device requires additional local configuration. This might be Bluetooth pairing, mobile device authentication with the IoT device, etc. Devices that require local configuration should return true from this method until the local configuration steps have been completed.
        返回:
        false if no additional local configuration is requried, true if local configuration is required to interact with the local device

      • fetchProperties

        public AylaAPIRequest fetchProperties(java.lang.String[] propertyNames,
                                      com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaProperty[]> successListener,
                                      ErrorListener errorListener)
        All requests to fetch properties (including fetchPropertiesCloud and fetchPropertiesLAN) are routed through this method for local devices. The local device implementation must return an array of AylaLocalProperty objects to the success listener in order for the property management to work. The implementation in AylaLocalDevice requests the properties from the cloud, and calls convertPropertyToLocal(AylaProperty) for each property and returns the array of AylaLocalProperty objects to the caller.
        覆盖:
        fetchProperties 在类中 AylaDevice
        参数:
        propertyNames - Array of names of properties to fetch, or null to fetch all properties
        successListener - Listener to receive the successful result
        errorListener - Listener to receive errors in case of failure
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be canceled

      • fetchPropertiesCloud

        public AylaAPIRequest fetchPropertiesCloud(java.lang.String[] propertyNames,
                                           com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaProperty[]> successListener,
                                           ErrorListener errorListener)
        Pass-through method to fetchProperties. AylaLocalDevices do not use LAN mode per-se, and only use the cloud service to obtain values that were previously uploaded by the mobile application.
        覆盖:
        fetchPropertiesCloud 在类中 AylaDevice
        参数:
        propertyNames - Array of names of properties to fetch, or null to fetch all properties
        successListener - Listener to receive the successful result
        errorListener - Listener to receive errors in case of failure
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be canceled

      • getCandidateJson

        public java.lang.String getCandidateJson(java.lang.String oem)
        Returns JSON sent to the service to obtain a registration candidate for devices of this type.
        参数:
        oem - OEM of the account the device should be registered to
        返回:
        JSON used to register the device. Subclasses must override this method to return the correct JSON to obtain a registration candidate for this device.
